title: Atlanta
description: Not gonna lie, Atlanta is my hometown. It will forever hold a special place in my heart. The big city in my small world, the weekend getaway, and eventually, the home that will always be "my home." While Atlanta doesn't always make it on everyone's bucket list, it truly is an underrated city. The amazing food scene, inventive art space, and blend of old-fashion southern hospitality with progressive ideals, Atlanta has become the best kept secret of The South.

title: Denver
description: My home since 2015, I love this rapidly changing city with it's unbelievable craft beer scene, small town feel, and the Rocky Mountains in it's backyard!

title: Paris
description: What can I say about the magical city of Paris that hasn’t already been said a thousand times? It’s the most beautiful city I’ve ever been to? Romance fills the air here? The food? The architecture? The art? The culture? It’s simply perfect. Except it’s not. Too many have over-idealized this city only to be disappointed when finally reaching it. Go knowing it’s imperfect so that you can see just how perfect it is!
